data.title: St. Louis Cardinals Catcher
data.meta_description: View the profile of St. Louis Cardinals Catcher Luis Cruz on ESPN (AU). Get the latest news, live stats and game highlights.
data.text:
Mariners reinstate Crawford from IL, option Canzone

The Seattle Mariners reinstated shortstop J.P. Crawford from the 10-day injured list on Wednesday, and optioned outfielder Dominic Canzone to Triple-A Tacoma.

Royals put Michael Lorenzen on 15-day IL with hamstring strain

Royals starting pitcher Michael Lorenzen has been placed on the 15-day injured list after he strained his left hamstring while covering first base against the Guardians.

Stephen A. takes surpising stance on Judge-Ohtani debate

Stephen A. Smith explains why Shohei Ohtani has put together a more impressive season than Aaron Judge.

The significance behind Rich Hill's Red Sox call-up

Check out the numbers behind 44-year-old Rich Hill being called up by the Red Sox.

Fantasy baseball pitcher rankings, lineup advice for Wednesday

Everything you need to know to place your MLB bets and set your fantasy baseball lineups for Wednesday.
